mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_attachfile(attachfile_no, contents_no, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, attachfile_rdate) VALUES(blog_attachfile_seq.nextval, #{contents_no}, #{fname}, #{fupname}, #{thumb}, #{fsize}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT attachfile_no, contents_no, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, attachfile_rdate FROM blog_attachfile ORDER BY contents_no DESC, attachfile_no ASC
